    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Une planète Mars plus lumineuse</string>
            <string language="en">Brighter Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hellerer Mars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Marte Mais brilhante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Marte Più luminoso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτεινότερος Αρης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un Marte Más brillante</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve que la planète semble plus lumineuse quand elle est plus proche de la Terre et semble plus faible quand est elle est plus éloignée.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the planet Mars looks brighter when it is nearer to Earth and looks dimmer when is it is further away.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Mars</string>
            <string language="en">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">orbite</string>
            <string language="en">Orbit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planète</string>
            <string language="en">Planet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">système solaire</string>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß der Planet die Blicke 
beschädigt, die heller sind, wenn er näher ist mit Erde zu bedecken 
und schwächer schaut, wenn er ist weiteres weg ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o planeta estraga os 
olhares mais brilhantes quando é mais próximo ligar à terra e olha 
mais não ofuscante quando é está um ausente mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il pianeta guasta 
i sembr più luminosi quando è più vicino interrare e sembra più 
fioco quando è è ulteriore assente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ο πλανήτης Αρης 
φαίνεται φωτεινότερος όταν είναι κοντινότερος στη γη και 
φαίνεται πιό αμυδρός πότε είναι είναι πιό πέρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el planeta estropea
las miradas más brillantes cuando es más cercano conectar a tierra y
parece más dévil cuando es está ausente adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
